summary: When a young girl living with her good-witch grandmother learns she too is a witch, she must help her grandmother save Halloweentown from evil forces.
cast: Debbie Reynolds|Kimberly J. Brown|Judith Hoag|Joey Zimmerman|Phillip Van Dyke|Emily Roeske|Robin Thomas|Shannon Day|J.W. Crawford|Jordyn F. Fields|Elizabeth Fugere|Nurmi Husa|Johnny Useldinger|Vincent Gambino|Judith M. Ford|Kenneth Choi|Michele Mariana|Hank Cartwright|Todd Tolces|Sherilyn Lawson|V. Jude Hill|George A. Keller|Michael Patrick Egan|Rino Romano|Jim Becker|Brian Landon|Betty Moyer|Roger Petan
title: Halloweentown: ¡Qué familia la mía!
